sentences.en: ...her unswerving belief in her father's innocence.
sentences.cn: ...她坚定地相信她父亲是清白的。

sentences.en: An unswerving, steely resolution showed on the old man's solemn face.
sentences.cn: 老沙头脸变得严厉, 呈现出毫不动摇的铁般的刚毅.

sentences.en: Excellent products and high quality services is our unswerving pursuit.
sentences.cn: 优良的产品与优质的服务是我们坚持不懈的追求.

sentences.en: He had an unswerving devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 他坚定不移地忠于职守.

sentences.en: He is unswerving in pursuit of his aims.
sentences.cn: 他坚定地追求自己的目标.

sentences.en: He showed unswerving loyalty to his friends.
sentences.cn: 他表现了对朋友始终不渝的忠心.

sentences.en: He was an unswerving empiri-cist with little time for theory.
sentences.cn: 他是个坚定不移的经验论者，不屑研究理论。

sentences.en: I suppoes gymnasts require iron will and unswerving spirit.
sentences.cn: 我想,体操运动员要求有钢铁般的意南和百折不挠的精神.

sentences.en: I suppose gymnasts require iron will and unswerving spirts.
sentences.cn: 我想,体操运动员要求有钢铁般的意志和百折不挠的精神.

sentences.en: Our continued success depends upon unswerving adherence to this standard.
sentences.cn: 持续的成功有赖于坚定地遵守这一原则.

sentences.en: The general had an unswerving devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 这位将军坚定不移地忠于职守.

sentences.en: The ways are unswerving, their goal is clear.
sentences.cn: 这方式坚定不移, 目标明确.

sentences.en: Tina: That you are loyal and unswerving in your convictions.
sentences.cn: 因为你是忠诚的与你不迷惘的确信.

sentences.en: What is it that characterizes your personality ? -- An unswerving aim.
sentences.cn: 你的主要特点是什么? ----- 目标始终如一.

sentences.en: Will guide the company as a fashion unswerving pursuit of the goal.
sentences.cn: 将引领时尚作为公司不懈追求的目标.

sentences.en: Yasha often envied their unswerving faith.
sentences.cn: 雅夏经常羡慕他们毫不动摇的信仰.

words.tran_cn: 坚定的；始终不渝的；不歪的

trans.tran_cn: 坚持不懈的，坚定不移的，不歪的，不偏离的
trans.tran_en: an unswerving belief or attitude is one that is very strong and never changes
